includedAssets.title: First You Dream, Then You Die
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep1 - First You Dream, Then You Die
includedAssets.synopsis: After his father suddenly dies, Norman Bates and his mother move to Oregon, where they buy a motel and plan a new life.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: After his father suddenly dies, Norman Bates and his mother move to Oregon, where they buy a motel and plan a new life.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: After his father suddenly dies, Norman Bates and his mother move to Oregon, where they buy a motel and plan a new life.

includedAssets.title: Nice Town You Picked, Norma...
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep2 - Nice Town You Picked, Norma...
includedAssets.synopsis: Norma's son from a previous marriage comes to town, as Norman begins spending more time with Emma.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Norma's son from a previous marriage comes to town, as Norman begins spending more time with Emma.

includedAssets.title: What's Wrong With Norman
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep3 - What's Wrong With Norman
includedAssets.synopsis: Norman is taken to hospital after passing out, while Dylan gets a mysterious new job and Shelby grows closer to Norma.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Norman is taken to hospital after passing out, while Dylan gets a mysterious new job and Shelby grows closer to Norma.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Norman is taken to hospital after passing out, while Dylan gets a mysterious new job and Shelby grows closer to Norma.

includedAssets.title: Trust Me
includedAssets.synopsis: Dylan comes to the rescue when Shelby arrives home with Norman still in the house, but Norma refuses to believe what he claims to have seen.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Dylan comes to the rescue when Shelby arrives home with Norman still in the house, but Norma refuses to believe what he claims to have seen.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Dylan comes to the rescue when Shelby arrives home with Norman still in the house, but Norma refuses to believe what he claims to have seen.

includedAssets.title: Ocean View
includedAssets.synopsis: Despite posting her bail, Norma's bizarre behaviour makes Norman feel guilty about being absent for his mother's arrest.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Despite posting her bail, Norma's bizarre behaviour makes Norman feel guilty about being absent for his mother's arrest.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Despite posting her bail, Norma's bizarre behaviour makes Norman feel guilty about being absent for his mother's arrest.

includedAssets.title: The Truth
includedAssets.synopsis: Dylan tries to ease Norma's influence over Norman, while also taking action to protect his mother.

includedAssets.title: The Man In Number 9
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep7 - The Man In Number 9
includedAssets.synopsis: Sheriff Romero arrives to find his deputy dead, while a former guest looks to continue his arrangement with the previous owner.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Sheriff Romero arrives to find his deputy dead, while a former guest looks to continue his arrangement with the previous owner.

includedAssets.title: A Boy And His Dog
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep8 - A Boy And His Dog
includedAssets.synopsis: Emma's father teaches Norman taxidermy after he brings him his dead dog, while Bradley is unhappy at a certain rumour at school.

includedAssets.title: Midnight
includedAssets.synopsis: Norma turns to Romero for help, who assures her all will be well, while things go wrong for Norman at the winter dance.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: After her husband dies in mysterious circumstances, overbearing mother Norma Bates and her troubled son Norman move to White Pine Bay, Oregon to start a new life running a motel. Chilling modern day prequel series to Psycho, Alfred Hitchcock's horror classic. Vera Farmiga and Freddie Highmore star.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: After her husband's death, Norma Bates and her son Norman try to start a new life running a motel. Modern day prequel to Alfred Hitchcock's Psycho.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: After her husband dies in mysterious circumstances, overbearing mother Norma Bates and her troubled son Norman move to White Pine Bay, Oregon to start a new life running a motel. Chilling modern day prequel series to Psycho, Alfred Hitchcock's horror classic. Vera Farmiga and Freddie Highmore star.

includedIn.title: Bates Motel
includedIn.synopsis: After the sudden death of her husband, Norma Bates and her son Norman move from Arizona to Oregon to start a new life running a motel. Things don't go to plan however, as the pair are forced to hide a grave secret while coping with Norman's deteriorating.
